title: Battle idea: Clef
content:
Design a [clef](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208232617/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clef).

 [‹ Helvetica in the news](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208232617/http:/typophile.com/node/52394 "Go to previous forum topic") [Chinese Writing: What are your top references? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208232617/http:/typophile.com/node/52114 "Go to next forum topic")
author: frode frank

comments.content: Or perhaps a whole new take on notation?
best battle yet. id be up for this. always wanted to do a project like this eg. what would musical notation look like if it was designed by eric gill etc..

Please forward battle ideas to feedback [at] typophile.com.

thanks!
Did so, but the recipient failed permanently (according to gmail).
